title: To Serve & Protect...
itunes:title: To Serve & Protect...
description:
. On this episode the crew gives a comparison of a younger Nipsey Hussle at 25 to Tupac at 25, the relationship between the gang community and the police, the "GRIP" program. (Gang Reduction Intervention Partnership) as well as the possibility of a gang truce, and what it would take to make it work. Rate, Subscribe, Comment & Share! " R.I.P. to all the fallen Soldiers, lets end the cycle of senseless violence" Support the show.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
